publ: by University of the west Indies Barbados
name: BajanFacts
0:
”Alexa open Bajan facts”
”Alexa ask Bajan facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell Bajan facts to tell me a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bajan facts
des:
Ask for Bajan Facts, and learn about the island of Barbados
.

Bajan facts provide knowledge of the culture of the island of Barbados. 

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Bajan Facts" or "Alexa, open BajanFacts" to get a fact".

At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
